TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CallbackCorrelationInitializer extends System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer
Public NotInheritable Class CallbackCorrelationInitializer Inherits CorrelationInitializer

Docs.summary: Initializes the associated with a callback correlation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A callback correlation is based on the callback context exchange mechanism described in the [.NET Context Exchange Protocol Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163882). To use callback correlation, a context-based binding such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding> must be used.
